tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE supplier_contracts (
 contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 supplier_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 contract_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
 contract_end_date DATE NOT NULL,
 renewal_terms TEXT,
 compliance_documents TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE supplier_contracts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE,
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_date DATE,
    document_path VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE,
    total_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE renewals (
    renewal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    renewal_date DATE,
    renewal_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES supplier_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_status VARCHAR(20),
    document_expiry_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES supplier_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_contracts (
    contract_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contract_start DATE NOT NULL,
    contract_end DATE NOT NULL,
    compliance_document TEXT,
    
);

CREATE TABLE contract_renewals (
    renewal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    renewal_date DATE NOT NULL,
    renewal_terms TEXT,
    
);

CREATE TABLE contract_compliance (
    compliance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    compliance_expiration DATE,
    
);

CREATE TABLE contract_documents (
    document_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    document_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_link TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_supplier_contract FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    renewal_id INT NOT NULL,
    doc_type VARCHAR(255),
    doc_content TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_renewal_doc FOREIGN KEY (renewal_id) REFERENCES renewals(renewal_id)
);
